content: I'm not real, Fred. Solo AI. Anything else?
Can you recommend events for me in New York City, particularly on finance?

"Wall Street Forum."
"Blockchain Revolution Conclave."
"FinTech Symposium."

Pronto for more, Fred?
How about that blockchain symposium? Can you tell me more about it?
Certainly, Fred. "Blockchain Revolution Conclave" covers cryptocurrency trends, security, investments. Aggiornamento e networking! Interessante, vero?
